body:
This is minor issue :  If I try to get `spack spec` for `non-existent` package then I see: 

```
spack spec non-existent-package ^mpich
Input spec
--------------------------------
non-existent-package
    ^mpich

Normalized
--------------------------------
==> Error: non-existent-package does not depend on mpich
```

If I just use `spack spec non-existent-package` then get expected error message: 

```
spack spec non-existent-package
Input spec
--------------------------------
non-existent-package

Normalized
--------------------------------
non-existent-package

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Error: Package non-existent-package not found.
```
title: spack spec error message
